project.description: HW regression PGA system test (HW+IL+BLL) for Thunderbird 4x10G I/O Board

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_CHASSIS_IP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address of Spirent TestCenter chassis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_INSTALL_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Spirent TestCenter BLL/UI installation target directory

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FILTER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: DEV_CI and HW_TBIRD and not slow and not disabled

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NUM_CPU
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of CPU (cores) available for parallel execution

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber compress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "prepare workspace" rm -rf ./${STC_INSTALL_DIR} rm -rf ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/
echo "get Spirent TestCenter BLL artifact" wget -nv http://jenkins.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8080/view/integration_summary_ci/job/bll_linux/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/build/il/bld_bll-el3_x86/Release/bin/TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz
echo "extract application files" tar -zxf TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz mv ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/ ./${STC_INSTALL_DIR}
#ls -al
echo "use API/Python/StcPython.py" #mv ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/StcPython.py ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/StcPython.py.stak cp -f ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/API/Python/StcPython.py ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/
echo "free up some space" rm -rf TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz

export STC_PRIVATE_INSTALL_DIR=${WORKSPACE}/${STC_INSTALL_DIR}
echo "switch to python virtual environment pytest-2.2.4" cd $HOME/ . $HOME/.virtualenvs/pytest-2.2.4/bin/activate
cd ${WORKSPACE}
echo "execute test suite" tclsh regression/util/unittest/all.tcl
python regression/run.py --vm-user-id=ci_regression --stc-pkg-dir=${WORKSPACE}/${STC_INSTALL_DIR} -m \'${FILTER}\' -n ${NUM_CPU} --archive-tmpdir --keep-all-tmpdir --basetemp=${WORKSPACE}/${TMP_DIR} --hw=\'{\"TBIRD\" :[ \(\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/1\",\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/10\"\) , \(\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/7\",\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/16\"\) , \(\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/17\",\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/18\"\) , \(\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/23\",\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/24\"\) ] }\' || sed -i 's/skips/skipped/g' ./*.junit.xml
echo "exit from python virtual environment" deactivate
echo "patch JUnit results file" echo "see https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-18095 and https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-17883 for more info"
sed -i 's/skips/skipped/g' ./*.junit.xml

#clean up results echo clean up results #python regression/jenkins/junitEmail.py --junit-file result.junit.xml --output-file email.properties #python regression/jenkins/junitEmail.py --junit-file result.junit.xml python regression/jenkins/removeResults.py --location ${WORKSPACE}/regression
